HERO.TITLE: Find Your
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Not casual dating. Not guesswork. A structured space where clarity meets connection and relationships are built with intention.

FEATURES.LABEL: Why Gylde
FEATURES.TITLE: Clarity, Not Guesswork
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Our members join because they want structure around what matters most—lifestyle, ambition, generosity, and intention.

LIFESTYLE.TITLE: Lifestyle Expectations
LIFESTYLE.DESCRIPTION: Be upfront about how you live and what you expect. No ambiguity—just aligned lifestyles from the start.

AMBITION.TITLE: Ambition & Growth
AMBITION.DESCRIPTION: Connect with members who value personal development, career goals, and building toward something greater.

GENEROSITY.TITLE: Generosity & Support
GENEROSITY.DESCRIPTION: A space for those open to giving and receiving support. Clear about intentions, respectful in approach.

INTENTION.TITLE: Built with Intention
INTENTION.DESCRIPTION: Every relationship here starts with purpose. No games, no uncertainty—just genuine, intentional connections.

VERIFIED.TITLE: Verified Members
VERIFIED.DESCRIPTION: Every profile is verified. Know that the person you are connecting with is real, serious, and authentic.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy & Discretion
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Your privacy matters. Share on your terms with robust controls designed for your peace of mind.

STEP_1.TITLE: Define What You Want
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Our structured profile guides you through lifestyle, ambitions, and relationship expectations. No guessing—just clarity.

STEP_2.TITLE: Find Aligned Matches
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: Browse verified members who share your intentions. Filter by what matters: lifestyle, goals, and openness to support.

STEP_3.TITLE: Connect with Purpose
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: Start conversations knowing you are both on the same page. Build relationships grounded in mutual respect and clear intentions.

VALUES.LABEL: Our Promise
VALUES.TITLE: Structure That Works
VALUES.DESCRIPTION: We built Gylde because dating should not require decoding mixed signals. Our platform gives you the structure to be clear about what you want—and find others who want the same.

LIST.CLEAR_EXPECTATIONS: Clear expectations from the first message
LIST.ZERO_TOLERANCE: Zero tolerance for dishonesty or games
LIST.STRUCTURED_PROFILES: Structured profiles that surface what matters
LIST.MUTUAL_RESPECT: A community built on mutual respect

CTA.TITLE: We Provide the
CTA.DESCRIPTION: You define the connection. Join a community built on clarity, intention, and mutual respect.

FOOTER.TAGLINE: We provide the structure. You define the connection.
FOOTER.DISCLAIMER: Gylde is a dating platform. We do not facilitate or condone any form of illegal activity.

STEP_1.TITLE: Let's Get Started
STEP_1.SUBTITLE: First, a few basics to ensure Gylde is right for you.
STEP_1.BIRTHDAY_HINT: We use this to verify your age and show it on your profile.
STEP_1.AGE_REQUIRED: You must be at least 18 years old to join Gylde.

STEP_2.TITLE: About You
STEP_2.SUBTITLE: Help us understand who you are and who you're looking to meet.
STEP_2.INTERESTED_QUESTION: Who are you interested in dating?
STEP_2.AGE_RANGE_QUESTION: What age range are you interested in?

STEP_3.TITLE: What Are You Looking For?
STEP_3.SUBTITLE: Select all that describe what you're open to. This helps us find your ideal matches.
STEP_3.GOALS_HINT: What type of connection are you seeking?
STEP_3.FRIENDS_FIRST_DESC: Start as friends, see where it goes
STEP_3.TRAVEL_PARTNER_DESC: Someone to explore the world with

STEP_4.TITLE: Support Orientation
STEP_4.SUBTITLE: Relationships involve different dynamics. This helps us understand what feels right for you.
STEP_4.SUPPORT_QUESTION: In a relationship, which best describes you?
STEP_4.SUPPORT_HINT: Select all that apply. This is optional.
STEP_4.EITHER: Open to either, depending on the connection

STEP_5.TITLE: In Your Own Words
STEP_5.SUBTITLE: Help others understand what you're looking for. Be authentic—it leads to better connections.
STEP_5.TAGLINE_PLACEHOLDER: A short phrase that captures who you are...
STEP_5.TAGLINE_HINT: This will be prominently displayed on your profile card.
STEP_5.IDEAL_QUESTION: What does an ideal relationship look like to you?
STEP_5.IDEAL_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the relationship you're hoping to build...
STEP_5.IDEAL_HINT: Be specific about what matters to you. This will appear on your profile.
STEP_5.SUPPORT_QUESTION: What does feeling supported in a relationship mean to you?
STEP_5.SUPPORT_PLACEHOLDER: Share what support means to you...
STEP_5.SUPPORT_HINT: Optional, but helps matches understand your perspective.

STEP_6.TITLE: Add Your Photos
STEP_6.SUBTITLE: Show the real you. Profiles with authentic photos get significantly more meaningful matches.
STEP_6.UPLOAD_HINT: Drag and drop or click to upload

STEP_7.TITLE: Build Trust
STEP_7.SUBTITLE: Verified profiles get more matches and build trust faster. You can always do this later.
STEP_7.VERIFY_QUESTION: Would you like to verify your profile?
STEP_7.IDENTITY_VERIFY_DESC: Confirm your identity with a government ID
STEP_7.PHOTO_VERIFY_DESC: Take a quick selfie to confirm you match your photos

COMPLETE.TITLE: Welcome to Gylde
COMPLETE.SUBTITLE: Your profile is ready. Start exploring intentional connections.

DASHBOARD.DISCOVER_SUB: Browse verified profiles aligned with your intentions.
DASHBOARD.MATCHES_EMPTY: When you match with someone, they'll appear here.
DASHBOARD.MESSAGES_EMPTY: Start a conversation with one of your matches.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.SUBTITLE: Manage your account, privacy, and preferences

ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity Settings
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: Control what activities are shared with other users
ACTIVITY.VIEW_NOTIFICATIONS_DESC: Others see when you view their profile
ACTIVITY.FAVORITE_NOTIFICATIONS_DESC: Others see when you favorite their profile
ACTIVITY.MESSAGE_NOTIFICATIONS_DESC: Others see activity when you message them

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy
PRIVACY.SUBTITLE: Control who can see your information
PRIVACY.ONLINE_STATUS_DESC: Let others see when you're online
PRIVACY.LAST_ACTIVE_DESC: Display when you were last active
PRIVACY.PROFILE_VISIBILITY_DESC: Make your profile visible in discovery
PRIVACY.SHOW_LOCATION_DESC: Display your city and country on your profile

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.SUBTITLE: Manage how you receive updates
NOTIFICATIONS.EMAIL_MATCHES_DESC: Get notified when you match with someone
NOTIFICATIONS.EMAIL_MESSAGES_DESC: Get notified when you receive a message
NOTIFICATIONS.EMAIL_FAVORITES_DESC: Get notified when someone favorites you
NOTIFICATIONS.PUSH_DESC: Receive push notifications on your device

PREFERENCES.TITLE: Preferences
PREFERENCES.SUBTITLE: Customize your experience
PREFERENCES.DARK_MODE_DESC: Switch between light and dark themes

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account
ACCOUNT.SUBTITLE: Manage your account settings
ACCOUNT.VERIFY_EMAIL_DESC: Confirm your email address to secure your account
ACCOUNT.PHONE_DESC: Add and verify your phone number

BLOCKED.TITLE: Blocked Users
BLOCKED.SUBTITLE: Manage users you've blocked
BLOCKED.MANAGE_DESC: View and unblock users you've blocked

DANGER.TITLE: Danger Zone
DANGER.SUBTITLE: Irreversible account actions
DANGER.DISABLE_DESC: Temporarily hide your profile from other users
DANGER.DISABLED_DESC: Your account is currently hidden from other users
DANGER.DELETE_DESC: Permanently delete your account and all data

DIALOGS.CHANGE_EMAIL_DESC: Enter your new email address. You'll need to verify it before the change takes effect.
DIALOGS.RESET_PASSWORD_DESC: We'll send a password reset link to your email address.
DIALOGS.RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
DIALOGS.DISABLE_DESC: Your profile will be hidden from other users and you will be signed out.
DIALOGS.DISABLE_INFO: You can re-enable your account at any time by signing back in.
DIALOGS.DELETE_DESC: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data, matches, and conversations will be deleted.
DIALOGS.LOGOUT_DESC: Are you sure you want to sign out?
DIALOGS.PHONE_PRIVACY: Your phone number is private and will never be shared with other members or displayed on your profile.
DIALOGS.PHONE_BENEFIT: Adding your phone number allows you to sign in with just your phone—no password needed.
DIALOGS.PHONE_HINT: Include your country code (e.g., +1 for US)
DIALOGS.PHONE_VERIFIED: Your phone number has been verified!
DIALOGS.VERIFY_EMAIL_DESC: We'll send a verification link to your email address. Click the link to verify your email.
DIALOGS.VERIFY_EMAIL_SENT: Verification email sent! Check your inbox and click the link to verify.
DIALOGS.EMAIL_NOT_YET_VERIFIED: Email not yet verified. Please click the link in the email we sent you.
DIALOGS.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many requests. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.

LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome Back
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Sign in to continue your journey.

SIGNUP.TITLE: Join Gylde
SIGNUP.SUBTITLE: Create your account and start connecting.

RESET.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET.SUBTITLE: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
RESET.SUCCESS: Check your email for a password reset link.

DISABLED.TITLE: Account Disabled
DISABLED.INFO: Would you like to re-enable your account and restore your profile?
